Sweat, dehydration, restlessness, anxiety, lethargy and lack of energy are common symptoms in the summer season. But if you keep some precautions in this season then lethargy can be run away. For this, keeping your fitness routine balanced with weather-friendly diet. Learn how to be in this season and how to keep yourself fit and healthy

 Must have glucose, peppermint all the time in the house and peppermint, and keep it common

 Do not drink the refrigerated cold water immediately after coming out from the heat. Instead, give priority to water from jar, mats or wheels

 If you are craving of sweet, then eat apple, gulka or petha of apple, amla or vine, instead of the sweet sweets of the market

 Eat fresh food and stay healthy. Just eat cooked food in summer, because in this season vegetables (especially tomato-potato vegetables), pulses are quickly spoiled. Eat well-cooked meals and stay away from high food
